question: Can I travel with my in-laws?
answer:
QUESTION
I am a 22 year old woman, living with my in-laws. Can I travel overseas with my in-laws? Can my father-in-law Who is 59 be my wali? Do I need my husband's permission to go with them? I will be with them all the time.
ANSWER


Share:
Your father-in-law is your Wali. However, you require your husband's
permission to travel.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
